title: RED DEAD REDEMPTION AND UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
headline: RED DEAD REDEMPTION AND UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
subtitle: Now Together on PlayStation 4
content:
Red Dead Redemption, the Western adventure that defined a generation, and its groundbreaking zombie-horror companion, Undead Nightmare, are now available for the PlayStation 4, bringing the two classic experiences together for both new players and original fans to enjoy on new platforms, including backwards compatibility with the PlayStation 5.

Now available on the PlayStation Store.
